resources.string: 3 button design to go to different activities, player, playlist
This screen could implement an equalizer. Touch to hide.

This screen shows the title of the song, its author and the cover, a button for favorite song, a button to go to the store, another to go to the list of songs, controls to raise, lower and mute the volume. Classic buttons Playback, it also features a simulated equalizer. Touch the list and select a song to see an example and touch the text to hide it.
This screen shows the most listened songs of the device, with a viewPager for example, then 3 lower buttons, to create a new playlist, a random list and to view the saved lists.
